sn35.219-221:3.1: 219–221 The Exterior and What’s Not-Self in the Three Times
sn35.219-221:4.1: “Mendicants, in the past … future … present sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and phenomena are not-self.
sn35.219-221:4.2: And what’s not-self should be truly seen with proper understanding like this: ‘This is not mine, I am not this, this is not my self.’ …”
